about_the_game:
Whether you are running a space based table top campaign and need a place to track the worlds your players visit, want to visually share the universe you created for them to play in, or want to track your observations of our night sky and imagine what could be out there, Stellar Navigator has you covered!

Stellar Navigator provides a unique toolset which allows you to build your dream galaxy and all the solar systems therein. You choose how to light up the night sky!

Craft a unique galaxy

Why stop at one solar system? Fill an entire galaxy! In the galaxy view, additional details may be added to each solar system and the background image and overlay can by modified.

Give life to your solar systems

Solar Systems

Add planetary bodies, moons, asteroids, black holes, and comets to each solar system and mark them up with the label system and markers. Or modify the asteroid belt's size scale and distance from its star.

Planets

Stellar Navigator offers creators the ability describe each of their planets and add planetary properties to further set worlds apart. These properties include:

  • The visual type of the planet

  • Biomes which are present on the planet

  • Elements (both known elements and the ability to create your own!)

  • Natural Satellites

  • Gravity

  • Temperature

  • Atmosphere

  • Day length

Tabletop

Export images with square or hexagonal grid overlays (or none) in a landscape or 1:1 layout for table top space combat games. Stellar Navigator also comes with a system tour mode that can run quietly in the background as a visual aid during your tabletop game sessions.

Additional Features & Support

Stellar navigator has been built to be used on small format screens as well as ultrawide monitors (E.g., 32:9 aspect ratio).

name: Stellar Navigator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 3700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti / Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Create a galaxy with individual solar systems and provide each with rich detail, history, and visual styles with Stellar Navigator. Set up visually stunning dioramas of your solar systems and define each celestial body, moon, asteroid, or even black hole with information that makes each unique.
